snippet: A look at the final of the Open Teams at the Surfer’s Paradise Congress in Broadbeach, Queensland, Australia, on March 3.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during the finals of the Open Teams at the Surfer's Paradise Congress in Broadbeach, Queensland, Australia.
